strap up homie

11 jan 2014

  • ??how to embed youtube vidz??

after trying a bunch of different combinations of dev tools, the following are my weapons of choice:

  • MacBook Air 11-in 1.3G Intel Core i5 4G 1600 MHz DDR3
  • OSX v 10.8.4
  • Rails 4.0.0
  • Ruby 2.0.0p247
  • Sublime Text 2 v 2.0.2
  • Base v 2.4.6
  • Nitrous.IO

honorable mention to the codelearn playground when working on computers that are not yours. it includes a browser based Terminal, File Browser, Code Editor and Preview.
